text:
STOP IT NOW

i mean, right now, stop bookmarking tweets & looking for prompt engineering hacks...

instead, study the fundamentals:

- model architecture differences (transformers vs diffusion vs retrieval)
- attention mechanism behavior and how it affects prompt structure
- training data bias recognition and mitigation strategies
- inference optimization for production deployment
- evaluation framework design for prompt effectiveness

you want tips, but skip the theory that makes tips actually work
